description: The RTTTL file consists of a single string that is divided into three sections, which are separated by colons. The first section is the name of the ringtone. The second section defines the control settings (d=duration, o=octave, b=beat). The third section describes the melody.
An example of the RTTTL file is below:
NOTE: Most cell phone manufacturers support the RTTTL format. The RTTTL file can be uploaded using programs, such as LogoManager Classic, to your cell phone.
